title: Biocon Moves to Fully Own Biologics Unit Valued at $5.5 Billion
description: Indian pharmaceuticals firm Biocon Ltd. will buy out minority shareholders in Biocon Biologics Ltd. via a mix of cash and shares in a deal that values the biosimilars unit at $5.5 billion.
content: Indian pharmaceuticals firm Biocon Ltd. will buy out minority shareholders in Biocon Biologics Ltd. via a mix of cash and shares in a deal that values the biosimilars unit at $5.5 billion.
